manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: IF CUSTOMER PURCHASE FROM OTHER SELLER THAN FLAX-PROTECTION HEALTH&BEAUTY, YOU WILL RECEIVE FAKE CHINESE MASK. SO, PLEASE CHECK SELLER WHEN YOU BUY IT Sold by Flax-Protection Health&Beauty

4-layered, highly effective filter for protection from air pollution and fine dust3-dimensional structure increasing breathing spaceAdjustable nose clip Providing non-slip wear and reducing heat and moisture accumulationElastic ear loops making itself comfortable to wear
HOW TO USE: Place mask over nose and mouth Place each cord around your ears Adjust the nose clip for the best fit Pull the edge of the mask up and down to ensure there is a tight fit

FILTERS MOST AIRBORNE PARTICLES This mask filters out most airborne particles, protecting wearers from exposure to harmful tiny particles down to 0.4um in diameter by the innovative technology. TRI-FOLDING STEREOSCOPIC DESIGN Structured to cover from your nose to chin, and from your left to your right jaw, our masks give you better protection and are less smeared from foundation, lipstick etc. LIGHTWEIGHT & FOLDABLE DESIGN The materials are made in Korea with hygienic protection. It's featuring elastic ear loop, pose less press to ears and face, avoid the uncomfortableness from long-time use.

Warnings: Do not place any cover under the mask. When damaged, soiled or polluted inside, stop the use and dispose. Do not wash. Do not give any variation to the mask. Do not touch the outer surface once you wear. If you are having problems breathing using the mask, talk to doctors and experts before further use. Do not use In a clinical setting where the infection risk level through inhalation exposure is high. Do not use in presence of high intensity heat source of flammable gas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good fit, easy to fold for temporary storage. Can breathe fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable & fit well. Good quality. No problem wearing it during 12 hours flight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Depends on your face
reviews.reviewText: I suggest to many people who look into reviews, there's not really many of these disposable masks that fit everyone's face :) You need to do your research a little bit and be creative a little more.With that said, these are fairly nimble masks. Filtering is probably very good, you can feel it is not very easily breathable. They would probably fit better if you have large or wide face/head. They are on the wide side of the spectrum, ear loops are fairly large as well, ain't help the situation.Built in wire by nose is kinda loose in fitting strength as well. So I use extra wire with adhesive on top of the one built-in to help tighten up the "over the nose" area, as well as tying up a nut on the loops to help make it a tighter fit. I'll attach the picture, I hope that helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can breath better
reviews.reviewText: These masks were recommended to me as the safest and most comfortable. These are made in Korea.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are very comfortable masks! Fit great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go to mask.
reviews.reviewText: Having used these masks for much of the pandemic, and gifted them to my family, I still like to have these on hand for travel. They are have a bit of breathing room and are very comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Must use the loop to attach to back of head or fix it to ponytail
reviews.reviewText: Edit (12/23/21): Removing 1 star from my original 4 stars, as I have to fix the ear loops to my ponytail, otherwise it really hurts the top of my ears after a couple of hours. Also, no matter how firmly I fix the mask against my face, it does not create a good seal, and my glasses fog up horribly.Original Review (11/25/21): Now that I'll be back working at the office, I've been trying a few different types of disposable masks to find the most comfortable to wear all day.These fit the bill nicely. I wore it on a 2 mile fast paced walk around the park to test it, and they were comfortable and easy to breath in even when I was huffing and puffing going up a steeper hill.In case someone is thinking about wearing them during exercise, be aware that it did create some condensation on the inside from hard breathing, which felt icky when my chin or lips touched the mask. But for wearing sitting at the office, they're perfect.I particularly like how they are individually wrapped. I can keep a few in the car or at my desk at work, and they won't get dirty or contaminated.My only complaint is that they are a little on the large side and fit loosely around the face. But the company provides you with a couple of plastic loops to pull them behind your head instead of ears, and that makes it fit snugly with a good seal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Provides adequate protection
reviews.reviewText: Very good masks. I work in healthcare and need adequate protection. These masks serve their purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 6, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable but a little big for my face

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Great for large faces, more comfortable than FFP2!
reviews.reviewText: The masks are great for large faces. (I even considered tightening the elastic loops but in the end haven't continued to do so.)Much more comfortable than FFP2s for talking and everyday wear.The masks are what is expected for KF94s, which are similar to FFP2, etc, etc. And yes, they are thin, but this is expected and they still contain all the stated layers, thanks to the advanced methods used to produce high quality filter masks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Labelled as large - may not fit many people
reviews.reviewText: Most masks fit me without a problem (I identify a "good" fit as when the mask visibly goes in and out when breathing). These ones are large enough that I struggle to get a good fit, and have to knot the earloops to make them much smaller.
